augurpy.pl.scatterplot.scatterplot

augurpy.pl.scatterplot.scatterplot(results1, results2, top_n=None, ax=None, return_figure=False)[source]

Create scatterplot with two augur results.

Parameters

  • results1 – results after running predict()

  • results2 – results after running predict()

  • top_n – optionally, the number of top prioritized cell types to label in the plot

  • ax (Optional[matplotlib.axes._axes.Axes]) – optionally, axes used to draw plot

  • return_figure (bool) – if True returns figure of the plot

Returns

Axes of the plot.

Return type

Union[matplotlib.figure.Figure, matplotlib.axes._axes.Axes]
